fields.value: Template Press
fields.name: press_name
fields.description: Name of the press, will be displayed throughout the system.

fields.name: footer

fields.value:
SUBMISSION GUIDELINES

Prior to completing your submission you must have adhered to the submission guidelines. This will ensure that your files are in the correct format and that each necessary element of the submission is available and ready for review as efficiently as possible. Failure to comply with these guidelines may result in revisions being requested prior to the review process beginning. If you have questions about this process then please contact the editorial team.

The basic book template, detailing each aspect of the book content, can be downloaded here.
fields.name: submission_guidelines

fields.value:
This is a description block where information about this press can be entered. This text block should be replace with text pulled from a database setting at some point, though for now I don't really need it to.

This press has some specialities like publishing Alien Autopsy reports and April Fools reviews

BOOYA!
fields.name: description

fields.value:
Dear {{ review.user.first_name }} {{ review.user.last_name }},

__YOUR_MESSAGE_HERE__ Please log into the press web site to indicate whether you will undertake the review or not, as well as to access the submission and to record your review and recommendation. The review itself is due {{ review.due }}.

The Author has requested that this review be {{book.get_review_type_display}}.

Please notify us if you intend to undertake the review by clicking this link: {{ decision_url }}

Thank you for considering this request.

Sincerely,

Press Team

{% if sender %}{{ sender.profile.signature|safe }}{% endif %}

fields.value:
Dear {{ review.user.first_name }} {{ review.user.last_name }},

__YOUR_MESSAGE_HERE__ Please log into the press web site to indicate whether you will undertake the review or not, as well as to access the submission and to record your review and recommendation.

fields.name: external_review_request

fields.value: If you have any suggestions about who could review this book, please add them here. Please ensure you include their email address, affiliation details and why they are suitable. Suggested reviewers must be wholly independent of the book project and must be from a separate affiliation than the authors/editors. All reviewers will be asked to declare any competing interests. the publisher does not guarantee to use these suggestions.

fields.value: on

fields.description: Determines whether users are required to enter Competing Interests statements.

fields.value: Test
fields.name: proposal_review_request

fields.value:
Dear {{submission.owner.first_name}} {{submission.owner.last_name}},

A contract has been uploaded by the Editor for you to review. Please login using the link below to review and sign off the contract. {{base_url}}/user/submission/{{submission.id}}

Regards
{% if sender %}{{ sender.profile.signature|safe }}{% endif %}
fields.name: contract_author_sign_off

fields.value:
Dear {{review.user.profile.salutation}} {{review.user.last_name}},

This is a gentle reminder that we requested you review a book for us called {{book.title}}.

This review is due to be completed by {{review.due:date"c"}}.

If you are unable to undertake this review, please let us know.

Regards,
fields.name: unaccepted_reminder

fields.value:
Dear {{review.user.profile.salutation}} {{review.user.last_name}},

This is a gentle reminder that you agreed to review a book for us called {{book.title}}. This review is due to be completed by {{review.due|date:"c"}}. If you are unable to undertake this review, please let us know.

Regards,
{% if sender %}{{ sender.profile.signature|safe }}{% endif %}
fields.name: accepted_reminder

fields.value:
Dear {{review.user.profile.salutation}} {{review.user.last_name}},


This is a gentle reminder that you agreed to review a book for us called {{book.title}}.

This review is overdue, we requested that the review be completed by {{review.due|date:"c"}}.

If you are unable to undertake this review, please let us know.


Regards,
fields.name: overdue_reminder

Regards,

Regards,

fields.value:
Dear {% if copyedit.copyeditor.profile.salutation %}{{copyedit.copyeditor.profile.salutation}}{% else %}{{copyedit.copyeditor.first_name}}{% endif %} {{copyedit.copyeditor.last_name}},

This is a request that you undertake copyediting on {{submission.title}}. Please login to the BMS, you will be directed to undertake your copyedit from the user dashboard.

Your username is: {{copyedit.copyeditor.username}}

Copyedits are requested to be completed by: {{copyedit.due}}.

Regards
{% if sender %}{{ sender.profile.signature|safe }}{% endif %}
fields.name: copyedit_request

fields.value: Hello Mr. Copyeditor. Please undertake this copyedit. You can download the files below and please upload the completed ones. If you have feedback for the Editor/Author fill in the notes box and this will be presented to both.
fields.name: copyedit_instructions

fields.value:
Book editors of {{submission.title}} have been updated.

{% if added_editors %}

These book editors have been added:

-------- {% for editor in added_editors %} {{editor.first_name}} {% if editor.middle_name %}{{editor.middle_name}} {% endif %}{{editor.last_name}}>{% if not forloop.last %}, {% endif %} {% endfor %} ---------- {% endif %} {% if removed_editors %}

These book editors have been removed:

-------- {% for editor in removed_editors %} {{editor.first_name}} {% if editor.middle_name %}{{editor.middle_name}} {% endif %}{{editor.last_name}}>{% if not forloop.last %}, {% endif %} {% endfor %} ---------- {% endif %}

View the submission: http://{{base_url}}/editor/submission/{{submission.id}}/

Regards,

RUA Bot

Regards,

fields.value:
Dear {{owner.profile.salutation_name}},

Thank you for submitting your book proposal, {{proposal.title}} {{proposal.subtitle}}, to {{press_name}}. You will be able to track its progress through the proposal review process by logging in to website.

Your proposal will be considered by our Editorial team, who my also seek external review of the proposal details. Following the completion of the review, you will be contacted with feedback and an editorial decision. Our editorial team will be in touch once this process has begun.

Should you have any questions regarding your book publication then please get in touch.

Kind regards,

{{principal_contact_name}}
{{press_name}}
